t: Amazon.com: Schogetten German Dark Chocolate (Pack of 3)
s: I'm a chocoholic and have tried many different brands of gourmet (real) chocolate. This Schogetten German chocolate is by far the best! I bought milk, dark & white, and each flavor is outstanding!!! Very tasty, rich & creamy!

t: Amazon.com : Schogetten Original German Chocolate Assortment Candy Bars, Pre-selected Bundle of 4-Dark Chocolate, White Chocolate, Alpine, Hazelnut, 4x100g : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This is exactly what I buy in Germany, Schogetten are a little sweeter than some brands and kids love it, adults usually have a square with coffee, not the entire box. They have an extra creaminess not found in American chocolates.

t: Amazon.com : Schogetten Dark Chocolate 100g (15-pack) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Schogetten has two types of dark chocolate...Dark Chocolate amargo and Zarbitter. I love the amargo... but they sent me Zarbitter...
